Britain: Hotel Launches Discover Art in London Package 
Hospitality 
A hotel in London with lots of contemporary British art on display has its own exhibition gallery and is now launching a Discover Art in London package with street art tours of the West End led by street artists British artist Botolph Lane leads tourists on a street art tour of London's East End, Photo Credit: Dorchester Collection. 

The 45 Park Lane in London is offering guests staying at the hotel street art tours of London's East End, which are led by actual street artists. Hotel guests taking the tours will get to see a broad array of street while learning in-depth details about each piece. 
What's included in the Discover Art in London package ... A Superior King room for 2 persons sharing a bed; Breakfast for 2; A private street art tour with Alternative London; A digital guide to London's top exhibitions; Complementary wi-fi. 
45 Park Lane 101 The stylish Art Deco entrance to the 45 Park Lane, a hotel in London, England, is right out of Miami Beach. Photo Credit: the Dorcheter Collection. 
The hotel is located in London's Mayfair district, steps from its sister hotel, The Dorchester. 
The hotel plays host to Cut at 45 Park Lane, Wolfgang Puck's first restaurant in Europe, and Bar 45, which serves signature cocktails and mouth-watering snacks. 
The hotel has a fitness studio, a spa, an artist's exhibition, and other facilities. 
The hotel's "unique selling propostion" is a comprehensive arts programme that includes personal exhibition tours led by the artists themselves, the chance to take painting lessons from artists, and access to artists' studios. 
A collection of contemporary British art is on display throughout the hotel. Guest rooms and hotel corridors are hung with a permanent collection of art. There are also temporary exhibitions and displays. 
Where 
44 Park Lane, 45 Park Lane, Mayfair, London, England. Telephone: +44 (0) 20 7493 4545. Hotel Website: 45 Park Lane .
